main event: Two discs, the size of a fifth-cent piece, flickated towards Andrews AFB at jet speed, maintaining a constant course while circling each other.
interesting points: The discs were observed at very high speed, possibly indicative of advanced technology., Witness account includes technical details of the observation method., The observer is identified as a mechanical engineer., The sighting involved aircraft personnel who reported the event., The sighting's conclusions involved speculative identification such as balloons or aircraft.
